startup_explanation: Go to settings to setup indexing and downloading folder, language and server properties
options_server_host_description: Server address in the local network:
options_base_photos_description: Photos folder, timeouts for indexing folder and database
options_photos_database_check_timeout_de: Caution! It will take a long time if you have many photos and weak PC!
options_photos_folder_check_timeout_desc: Timeout between searches for new photos in the folder:
It takes from 1 to 10 seconds depending on photos quantity
options_photos_manual_indexing_descripti: Manually start database and upload folder indexing
options_misc_setup_done_description: Don't show startup offer at the main page
server_answer_not_folder: Given path is not a folder
server_answer_folder_drive: A photos folder must be on the same logic disk with the app
server_answer_oops_it_seems_not: Oops! It doesn't come across as
js_new_folder_path: Enter new absolute path to the photos folder on the server
js_new_language: Select the required localization from the given
